content: {"name": "The Connected Chef (Queens)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Register online for low-cost & free grocery boxes for pickup or delivery (in most of Queens), though the free option has a waiting list (~3 months). Once you're on the free option, you will receive weekly deliveries. Eligibility for the free option: unemployed due to pandemic & those who do not qualify for traditional forms of gov't aid. The low-cost boxes are pay-what-you-can weekly subscription from $25-$45 (no questions asked), and you may pause or cancel at any time. All boxes include 25-30 lbs of fresh fruits, vegetables, and grains. Delivery is $6; pickup is $2.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.theconnectedchef.org/groceries", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "New York", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7127753, "longitude": -74.0059728}}
